result.execSummary:
All charges against Richard A. Wilkerson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Richard A. Wilkerson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Richard A. Wilkerson
Current: PO Box 661, Dodge Correctional Institution, Waupun, WI 53963-0661 United States  (Effective: 04-19-2022)
Prior: 1612 59Th St, Kenosha, WI 53140

Minutes:  22CF82/22CF83/21CF1278.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Drew Lehman appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody along w/Atty Xavier Solis.  

21CF1278 - (Count 1) - deft sentenced to 54 mos WSP followed by 5yrs of ES.  See ES conditions.  Deft not eligible for CIP or SAP.  Attys to calculate credit and submit to the Court for approval.   (Count 3) - sentence w/held; placed on probation for 18mos.  Probation is consecutive to count 1 in this file but concurrent to 22CF83.  See conditions.  Bond to be applied towards financial obligations.  Alcohol assessment ordered.  DL revoked for 36mos.  IID ordered for 36mos.

22CF83 - deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for 3yrs consecutive to count 1 in 21CF1278, but concurrent to count 3 in 21CF1278.  See conditions.  

22CF82 - case dismissed on State's motion.

21CT181 - previously dismissed.  Bond to be applied towards financial obligations.

Minutes:  22CF82/22CF83/21CF1278.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Drew Lehman appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody along w/Atty Xavier Solis.  Atty Solis reports the new cases are not resolved; JSH set for 4/7/22 @ 12:45pm.  Court will conduct ludwig hrg at that time.  21CF1278 (sentencing)  set over to 4/7/22 @ 12:45pm.
at the request of DA dates rescheduled.  PTC 03-23 at 950am Br 3    JS 04-11-22 at 9am Br 3.

Defendant Richard A. Wilkerson in court, in custody.  Attorney Carli A. McNeill appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE is eligible for SPD but has not been appointed an attorney for today's hearing.  Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time for today's hearing.  DE waives right to an attorney for today's hearing and will make a request to SPD to appoint for future hearings.     DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  DE makes a speedy trial demand orally today. Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Jury selection scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.
made orally by DE during preliminary hearing.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.

01:47 PM   Attorney Jazmin Ramirez Bailon appeared for the State.   Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Brian Rolf.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 28, 2022 at 09:00 am. $7000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). Attorney moves to dismiss Count #2 - no objection - Count #2 is dismissed. mi
